Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory279.png'}
{3: 'As you look for a way in, Murray happens to come through in your comms.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Signal's finally back. What's your status?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "We've discovered a colossal creature here. We're unsure how to get near it yet.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'No worries. There should be a transport pod from the old factories where you guys are. You can give that a shot.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'A transport pod?', 3: '502'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Murray, you seem to be very familiar with the layout of this place.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I just found a map of this underground city, so I've marked a concealed entry for you guys.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Hold on. Something came up that I've got to handle. Talk soon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray smiles as he disconnects. Lee frowns, being lost in thought.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv, analyze the background noises in our call with Murray.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Analysis complete. There were two faint sounds in the background during the call.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'One came from the cries of Hetero-Creatures, the other the sound of the wind.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I see. That Murray was indeed an imposter.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I knew something was wrong.', 3: '27'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The transport pod is quite possibly just another trap.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'If it was not Murray, who is it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I remember Commandant mentioning an Ascendant who can turn invisible and shapeshift...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '"Murry" will call again soon. This time we have to track her down.', 4: '1'}
